name: DeckEleven's Railroads 2
description:
DeckEleven's Railroads 2 is a fun and addictive railroads building game. Like a true Tycoon, you are in charge of everything! Design and build the perfect railways network. Choose between steam, diesel and electric locomotives. Manage your stations, cargo, train routes, research, finance, fuel logistics, power grid, and much more...

30+ fun and challenging missions just for you! And a free play sandbox mode if you want more!
